snippet: A year after Mr. Frazier’s death, a movement has taken off to cement the boxer’s legacy in his adopted city.
abstract: Momentum is building in Philadelphia to designate as a historic site the former gym of late boxer Joe Frazier; city is also working with his estate to erect a statue honoring him; efforts represent a rethinking of Frazier's legacy in his adopted city, which never so much as named a street after him during his lifetime.
lead_paragraph: A year after Mr. Frazier’s death, a movement has taken off to cement the boxer’s legacy in his adopted city.

headline.seo: Saving Joe Frazier’s Gym, and His Philadelphia Legacy
headline.main: Joe Frazier Wins Belated Embrace as Philadelphia Starts a Fight
headline.print_headline: Joe Frazier Wins Belated Embrace as Philadelphia Starts a Fight
